M

MagicArtifactBuilder - Class in <Unnamed>
The MagicArtifactBuilder is a concrete implementation of MagicItemBuilder interface.
MagicArtifactBuilder() - Constructor for class MagicArtifactBuilder
The constructor instantiates the String representation of the Product.
MagicItemBuilder - Interface in <Unnamed>
The MagicItemBuilder is an interface that holds all the necessary methods/steps a builder would need to construct a magic item description.
MagicPotionBuilder - Class in <Unnamed>
The MagicPotionBuilder is a concrete implementation of MagicItemBuilder interface.
MagicPotionBuilder() - Constructor for class MagicPotionBuilder
The constructor instantiates the String representation of the Product.
MagicStarterPackApp - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Magic Starter Pack Generator application that serves as the Client in the Builder Pattern this app is based on.
MagicStarterPackApp() - Constructor for class MagicStarterPackApp
 
MagicStarterPackDirector - Class in <Unnamed>
The MagicStarterPackDirector is passed in a specific concrete builder to construct it's specific product in a step-wise manner.
MagicStarterPackDirector(MagicItemBuilder) - Constructor for class MagicStarterPackDirector
The constructor receives a builder and saves it to the global builder variable to be correctly manipulated in other methods.
MagicWandBuilder - Class in <Unnamed>
The MagicWandBuilder is a concrete implementation of MagicItemBuilder interface.
MagicWandBuilder() - Constructor for class MagicWandBuilder
The constructor instantiates the String representation of the Product.
main(String[]) - Static method in class MagicStarterPackApp
The main method creates a MagicStarterPack client and displays an app with various buttons that allow you to create descriptions of different magic items as part of a magic starter pack for a new witch or wizard (possibly for an RPG game).
